name: Heimdall
short_description: Application dashboard and launcher with simple icon-based interface.
description: Application dashboard and launcher with simple icon-based interface. Heimdall is a self-hosted application focused on dashboard, organization, monitoring, utility. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose.
usecases: Self-host Heimdall on your home server to application dashboard and launcher with simple icon-based interface without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Heimdall to manage your dashboard workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
